    {"s":"attenuation coefficient", "p":"produces", "o":"sharp jump", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"the attenuation suddenly increases. This produces a sharp jump in the attenuation curve, known as the K-edge."},

evidence: For example, in gold, the K-edge occurs at about 80.7 keV.
